As CTO, I managed Engineering, Tech Ops, Analytics and User Acquisition teams. Responsible for growing the teams from 0 to 80 people. Did everything from recruiting, designing architecture, writing code, mentoring new engineers to grow into leads / managers / architects, creating lifetime value model, buying ads, selling ads, to assembling furniture and answering emails.
